blogPost.excerpt: ManyPixels is an on-demand & tech-enabled design service that is fast, affordable & easy-to-use. 1,500 startups and SMBs have used ManyPixels for their graphic and web design projects. Submit your design request today. Get it back tomorrow. Easy as that!
blogPost.body: ManyPixels is an on-demand & tech-enabled design service that is fast, affordable & easy-to-use. 1,500 startups and SMBs have used ManyPixels for their graphic and web design projects. Submit your design request today. Get it back tomorrow. Easy as that!
blogPost.title: ManyPixels 2.0 - Your virtual, on-demand graphic design team!
blogPost.author: Quentin Gilon

localize.description: ManyPixels是一个按需和科技化的设计服务，它快速、实惠、易于使用。1,500家初创企业和中小企业已经使用ManyPixels进行平面和网页设计项目。今天提交您的设计要求。明天就能得到回复。就这么简单
localize.tagline: 您的虚拟、按需的平面设计团队!

localize.description: ManyPixels是一個按需和科技化的設計服務，它快速、實惠、易於使用。1,500家初創企業和中小企業已經使用ManyPixels進行平面和網頁設計項目。今天提交您的設計要求。明天就能得到回覆。就這麼簡單
localize.tagline: 您的虛擬、按需的平面設計團隊!

previous.excerpt: Take a Walk is a tool made to keep you company while you work or study. You name the place, weather, and time of day, or just leave the magic up to us. It's up to you ❤️
previous.title: Take A Walk - Go anywhere in the world while you WFH, study or just relax.

localize.description: Take a Walk是一款在你工作或学习时陪伴你的工具。你可以指定地点、天气和时间，也可以把魔法交给我们。由你决定❤️
localize.tagline: 当你在WFH，学习或只是放松时，去世界任何地方。

localize.description: Take a Walk是一款在你工作或學習時陪伴你的工具。你可以指定地點、天氣和時間，也可以把魔法交給我們。由你決定❤️
localize.tagline: 當你在WFH，學習或只是放鬆時，去世界任何地方。

next.excerpt: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
next.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform

localize.description: 网上的深层假视频正在成倍增长。如何验证你看的是否是假视频？AI生成的社交资料现在已经无处不在。如何确定你最后的LinkedIn连接不是一个假人？用Sensity来分析它们。
網上的深層假視頻正在成倍增長。如何驗證你看的是否是假視頻？AI生成的社交資料現在已經無處不在。如何確定你最後的LinkedIn連接不是一個假人？用Sensity來分析它們。
